title: The Music of a modern navy
creator_credit: Vincent Donovan and Australia. Navy Office. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: In a fast moving “cinema verite” style film the bands of the Royal Australian Navy play jazz, pops, country and western, Latin American and martial music. In changing locales, such as Kings Cross, Australia Square, the Royal Brisbane Show, in New South Wales country towns, on board ship and in Naval establishments they perform and entertain.
